Name: Cooling Tower - Capacity: 750 to <1000 Ton - Vibration isolated equipment that is not snubbed or restrained - Equipment fragility only

GeneralInformation.Description: Costing is per unit and is based upon 850 Ton.

DamageStates.Description: Damaged equipment and attached piping but anchorage is OK.
